item.description:
As a small boy at Joe Gargery's forge, Pip meets two people who will affect his whole life - Magwitch, an escaped convict he is forced to help, and the eccentric Miss Havisham, whose beautiful, cold ward Estella young Pip adores. But when a secret benefactor pays for him to go to London to become a gentleman, Pip never dreams he will meet the dreadful Magwitch again, nor just how wrong his expectations are . . .

 You know the story...but when was the last time you read it for pure enjoyment? And are you quite sure you unlocked all its mysteries? Let us look into its pages again, as we get ready to celebrate the 200th anniversary of the Victorian master. Feel free to send me your suggestions on how we can amplify the celebration.

group.name: Classic Books: Book Club for Die-hard Readers

item.name: Dickens: Great Expectations
